Ingatkan Bahaya Politik Uang, Bawaslu Bondowoso Sosialisasikan Kampung Anti Money Politics
04 Nov 2019, 10:41 by Sandy


Ingatkan Bahaya Politik Uang, Bawaslu Bondowoso Sosialisasikan Kampung Anti Money Politics

KBRN, Bondowoso : Selain memberikan pendidikan politik, Badan Pengawas Pemilu (Bawaslu) Kabupaten Bondowoso dalam waktu dekat akan mengadakan Kampung Anti Money Politics, untuk membangun kesadaran masyarakat tentang bahaya politik uang.
Moh. Mahsun, Ketua Bawaslu Bondowoso kepada RRI, Senin (4/11/19) mengatakan, tidak hanya saat Pilkada, namun mendekati Pemilihan Kepala Desa (Pilkades) yang akan digelar pada Desember nanti, praktek politik uang juga rawan terjadi di lingkungan masyarakat.
“ Money politics kalau dibahasakan di luar Pemilu kan ada suap dan lain sebagainya. Nah kami ingin menyadarkan masyarakat bahwa money politics sangat berbahaya bagi tegaknya sendi-sendi demokrasi dan bagi pemerintahan yang bersih,” jelasnya.
Kata Makhsun, Bawaslu Bondowoso sebelumnya sudah melakukan patroli anti money politics namun dia mengaku sulit untuk menemukannya, karena  praktek ilegal tersebut dilakukan sangat rapi.“ Cuma kalau desas-desus itu pasti ada. Ya, akhirnya kita memilih menyadarkan masyarakat untuk menolak politik uang,” sambungnya.
Upaya menyadarkan masyarakat terkait bahaya politik uang dilakukan dengan cara melakukan sosialisasi dan mengajak masyarakat mendeklarasikan kampung anti money politik. “ Minimal kita sudah menyampaikan kepada 100 sampai 400 orang, kita ajak mereka untuk berpikir bahwa politik uang itu berbahaya,” katanya.
Untuk menggencarkan sosialisasi kampung anti money politics, Bawaslu Bondowoso akan berkoordinasi dengan beberapa desa terkait. “ Sejauh ini belum final karena berbenturan dengan jadwal kegiatan desa. Jadi saat ini masih dalam tahap membuat embrio Kampung Pengawasan,”lanjutnya.
Selain itu, kata Makhsun, berdasarkan kegiatan Pemilu di Bondowoso beberapa waktu lalu, Bawaslu mengklaim kawasan rawan money politics di Bondowoso cenderung merata. Hal itu dipengaruhi oleh faktor geografis dan tingkat pendidikan. “ Semakin mapan tingkat pendidikannya, praktek money politics relatif lebih kecil karena tingkat kesadarannya sudah tumbuh,”pungkasnya.
Perlu diketahui, saat ini Bawaslu sedang gencar melakukan sosialisasi pendidikan politik dengan membentuk Kampung Awas yang bertujuan untuk mengajak masyarakat melakukan pengawasan partisipatif Pemilu. Artinya, kata Makhsun, penindakan masyarakat melibatkan stakeholder diluar penyelenggara menjadi sesuatu yang penting. Karena tidak hanya urusan Pemilu saja yang butuh pengawasan partifipatif, namun juga proses pembangunan demokrasi maupun pembangunan secara umum di tingkat desa sampai kota, pengawasan partifipatif dinilai sangat penting agar masyarakat lebih pro aktif dalam mengawal proses demokrasi.(san)

Reminding the Dangers of Money Politics, Bawaslu Bondowoso Promotes Anti Money Politics Village
Nov. 04, 2019, 10:41 by Sandy


Reminding the Dangers of Money Politics, Bawaslu Bondowoso Promotes Anti Money Politics Village

KBRN, Bondowoso: In addition to providing political education, the Election Oversight Body (Bawaslu) of Bondowoso Regency will soon hold an Anti Money Politics Village, to build public awareness about the dangers of money politics.
Moh. Mahsun, Chairwoman of Bawaslu Bondowoso told RRI on Monday (4/11/19) said, not only during the elections, but approaching the Election of Village Heads (Pilkades) which will be held later in December, the practice of money politics is also prone to occur in the community.
"Money politics, if banned outside the General Election, there are bribes and so forth. Now we want to make people aware that money politics is very dangerous for the establishment of the foundations of democracy and for a clean government, "he explained.
Makhsun said, Bawaslu Bondowoso had previously conducted anti-money politics patrols but he admitted it was difficult to find, because the illegal practice was carried out very neatly. "Only if there were rumors that there must be. Yes, in the end we chose to make people aware of rejecting money politics, "he continued.
Efforts to sensitize the public regarding the dangers of money politics are carried out by conducting socialization and inviting the public to declare political anti money villages. "At a minimum we have conveyed to 100 to 400 people, we invite them to think that money politics is dangerous," he said.
To intensify the socialization of the anti-money politics village, Bawaslu Bondowoso will coordinate with several related villages. "So far it has not been final because it clashes with the schedule of village activities. So currently it is still in the stage of making a Village Supervision embryo, "he continued.
In addition, said Makhsun, based on the Election activities in Bondowoso some time ago, Bawaslu claimed the areas prone to money politics in Bondowoso tended to be evenly distributed. It was influenced by geographical factors and level of education. "The more established the level of education, the practice of money politics is relatively smaller because the level of awareness has grown," he concluded.
It is important to know, currently Bawaslu is intensively conducting political education socialization by forming Kampung Awas which aims to invite the public to conduct participatory oversight of the General Election. This means, said Makhsun, that community action involving stakeholders outside the organizer becomes important. Because not only Election matters that need participatory supervision, but also the process of building democracy and development in general at the village to city level, participative supervision is considered very important so that the community is more pro-active in guarding the democratic process. (San)
